text.english: Arise, O LORD, in Your anger; Lift Yourself up because of the rage of my enemies; Rise up for me to the judgment You have commanded! The LORD shall judge the peoples; Judge me, O LORD, according to my righteousness, And according to my integrity within me.
text.arabic: قُمْ يَا رَبُّ بِغَضَبِكَ. ارْتَفِعْ عَلَى سَخَطِ مُضَايِقِيَّ وَانْتَبِهْ لِي. بِالْحَقِّ أَوْصَيْتَ. الرَّبُّ يَدِينُ الشُّعُوبَ. اقْضِ لِي يَا رَبُّ كَحَقِّي وَمِثْلَ كَمَالِي الَّذِي فِيَّ.
